calculated_fields.Netted T:
Sum(IF [R/RR]="R" THEN 
([Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)])*-1
ELSEIF  [R/RR]="RR" THEN
([Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)]) END)

-SUM([fixed netting (T)])
calculated_fields.Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD):
if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] then 
    (if [Max Date]= [RpDate] AND [Is Internal ? (group)]="external" AND [Is Forward Start ?]=0 THEN [Ut. US MM] else 0 END)
else if [RpDate]= [Parameters].[End Date] AND [Is Internal ? (group)]="external" AND [Is Forward Start ?]=0 then [Ut. US MM] else 0 END END
calculated_fields.fixed netting (T):
{FIXED   [RpDate],[CounterParty],[Cash curr],[Maturity Date] : MIN(
[fixed netting 3 R (T)],[fixed netting 3 RR (T)])}
calculated_fields.fixed netting 3 R (T):
Sum(ABS({FIXED   [RpDate],[Subs],[Counterpty],[Cash curr],[Maturity Date],[R/RR]: 
(
(Sum(IF [Is Forward Start ?] = 0 AND [Is Approved for Netting] = "1" 
AND [Bucket]<>"open"  AND  [R/RR]="R" AND [Title Date Filter]=1

THEN ([Ut. US MM]) ELSE 0 END)))}))
calculated_fields.Max Date:
case datepart('weekday',today())
    when 1 then today()-2
    when 2 then today()-3
    else today()-1
    END
calculated_fields.fixed netting 3 RR (T):
Sum(ABS({FIXED   [RpDate],[Subs],[Counterpty],[Cash curr],[Maturity Date],[R/RR]: 
(
(Sum(IF [Is Forward Start ?] = 0 AND [Is Approved for Netting] = "1" 
AND [Bucket]<>"open"  AND  [R/RR]="RR" AND [Title Date Filter]=1
THEN ([Ut. US MM]) ELSE 0 END)))}))
calculated_fields.Title Date Filter:
if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] then 
    (if [Max Date]= [RpDate] then 1 else 0 END)
else if [RpDate]= [Parameters].[End Date] then 1 else 0 END END
